CustomField.description: Sum of Sale Revenue and Lease Upfront One-Times to capture all Revenue for either type of business (Sale or Lease).
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c),
(Upfront_Project_Costs_L__c *( Upfront_Mark_up_L__c + 1)) + ( Upfront_Project_Costs_S__c *( Upfront_Markup_S__c + 1)) + ((New_Capped_Costs_S__c + In_fleet_Capped_Costs_S__c) * (Building_Mark_up_S__c + 1)),
(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Upfront_Project_Costs_L__c * ( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Upfront_Mark_up_L__c + 1)) + (SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Upfront_Project_Costs_S__c * ( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Upfront_Markup_S__c + 1)) + (( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.New_Capped_Costs_S__c + SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.In_fleet_Capped_Costs_S__c )*( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.Building_Mark_up_S__c + 1))
)
CustomField.label: Upfront Revenue
